pages.text: This turret is one of the hardest to create as you have managed to inject wither's DNA directly into a standard seed. $(br) $(br)Attributes: $(li)Can only be created with a $(l:growth_controller)Growth Controller$(/l) upgraded at $(l:tier4_upgrade)tier 4$(/l).$(li)Throws bullets that gives wither to the target.

pages.name: Wither Turret
pages.text: This beautiful plant could kill you with a single pea, and watch you die slowly in pain! Avoiding conflict is recommended
